channel.title: CollusionX Is looking for beta testers!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've recently been coding collusionx a lot. Meaning i need others to test some things for me, Would you like to join the beta testing? That's great!
--------------- 1. Are their any requirements to join? 2. Absolutely not, Everyone may join. As long as you do what is being expected from you! --------------- 1. How do i join the beta testing? 2. Add the following on skype: live:triologys12 3. It has an anime avatar and a blue background on the profile picture. --------------- I hope you would like to help and join the beta testing! If i think you're experienced you might even have an change on joining the team. ;)

item.title: CollusionX Is looking for beta testers!
item.dc:creator: @Scotsa Scotsa
item.description:
@Scotsa wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve recently been coding collusionx a lot.
Meaning i need others to test some things for me,
Would you like to join the beta testing? That’s great!

  1. Are their any requirements to join?
  2. Absolutely not, Everyone may join. As long as you do what is being expected from you!
  1. How do i join the beta testing?
  2. Add the following on skype: live:triologys12
  3. It has an anime avatar and a blue background on the profile picture.

I hope you would like to help and join the beta testing!
If i think you’re experienced you might even have an change on joining the team.

Read full topic
item.source: CollusionX Is looking for beta testers!
